metadata.name: Suspicious PowerShell Mailbox SMTP Forward Rule
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the powerShell Set-Mailbox Cmdlet to set-up an SMTP forwarding rule.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('set-mailbox ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -delivertomailboxandforward ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -forwardingsmtpaddress ')))

output.summary: Detects usage of the powerShell Set-Mailbox Cmdlet to set-up an SMTP forwarding rule.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage of the cmdlet to forward emails Reference: https://m365internals.com/2022/10/07/hunting-in-on-premises-exchange-server-logs/
